page.title: 15SHOPS IN TREGONY
page.content: THERE ARE THREE GENERAL STORES IN TREGONY INCLUDING,SPAR,CENTRAL STORES AND TREGONY HILL STORES. THERE IS A BUTCHERS WHICH IS OWNED BY PAUL JULIEFF,BEFORE THIS WAS OPENED THE BUTCHER USED TO COME AROUND TO PEOPLES HOUSES ABOUT ONCE A WEEK. TREGONY HAS TWO ANTIQUE SHOPS,AND A FURRIERS WHICH IS OWNED BY MR FARKAS. THIS HAS NOT BEEN RUNNING FOR VERY LONG. THERE IS ALSO A DENTISTS AND TWO DOCTORS SURGERIES WHERE THE DOCTORS VISIT DURING THE WEEK.THESE ARE FOR THE ONLY VERY GENERAL PROBLEMS BUT FOR BIGGER PROBLEMS YOU HAVE TO GO TO THE SURGERY IN PROBUS. THERE USED TO BE A CAFE BUT THIS HAS NOW BEEN TAKEN OVER BY THE ANTIQUES. THERE IS ALSO THE KEA HOUSE RESTAURANT WHICH HAS BEEN HERE FOR QUITE A FEW YEARS.
